extendedInfo.description: Get the latest Arrival times for DC Metro Area (WMATA) Buses. Set up to 10 stops as Favorites for easy access. Access your favorites by clicking the Menu button.

reviews.title: the worse app
reviews.comment: caused me to miss 3 buses in a row....says i have 64 minutes till next bus as soon as i start walking the bus past me
reviews.author: Neiko Gates

reviews.title: Needs an update BAD
reviews.comment: I love this app however it needs to be improved. I\'d like to be able to delete old routes from my favorites but it wont let me.also, should include all buses, not just metrobus. There are other commutter lines out there. Uninstall :(
reviews.author: India Franklin

reviews.title: Samsung blaze
reviews.comment: App works great most of the time Wen it\'s not freezing, force closing having times be off a lil. Takes to long to update time arrivals. Oh yeah and I would love to erase the old buses in my favorites instead of adding new to the old routes I don\'t need anymore. Then u can get 5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be awesome if you could delete \"favorites\".  I have some in my list that I don\'t use anymore and can\'t find a way to get rid of them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beauteous
reviews.comment: Very Helpful To My Sisters And I.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Times in error
reviews.comment: I just missed a bus, when I was told I had 22 minutes to wait. It was on point last week, now it sucks! If I can\'t rely on the bus times on the app....what can I trust? FIX PLEASE, PEOPLE RELY ON YOU TO BE ON TIME, JUST TREAT THOSE WHO PAY YOYR SALARIES!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its a life saver. But it takes up too much space
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Nice & easy to use...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Totally Useless
reviews.comment: This is a totally useless app if you are anywhere in Montgomery County. It only shows Metro buses that are in DC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: On time!
reviews.comment: This is a very useful app, you\'re to really schedule you trip.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love ot...its so helpful..it gives the 3 times closet to the time right now. It is very accurrate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its A Good App But It Needs GPS For Ppl Who Dont Noe Wat Street They\'re On Exactly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I use this for getting the time of next bus so it work really well (forestville) cricket android
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Accurate than a mutherf***er suggest this to all in the DMV....htc hero 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app if it works...
reviews.comment: Kept locking up my phone. Had to completing shut down & restart in a 10 minute period.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bus schedule Wmata
reviews.comment: Such a life saver, awesome app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was OK for a few days, but now it doesnt stop force closing when it goes to get the times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: I can\'t even use it because it\'s always forcing close
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working...
reviews.comment: I have tried this app a number of times--it does not give times the evening prior and does not give accurate times the day of: I love the concept
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wmata
reviews.comment: I love this app but sometimes the times are inaccurate. Please fix this within your system.
reviews.author: Aisha Childs
